live.title: heal process
live.location: BNYC Black Box Theatre, New York
live.description: Live performance of the album "heal process".

live.title: BUDAYA 4.0: Cerita Kita | A Tapestry of Malaysian Tales
live.description: Student-run concert at Berklee College of Music showcasing original music composed through a fusion of multiple cultures and historical periods in Malaysian society, influenced by indigenous, immigrant, and colonizing powers.
roles: Technical Director (set design, playback engineering, track production, backing track recording engineer, live visual artist, Max/MSP programming)
Head of Post Production (show mix & master)

live.title: Budaya 3.0: Generasi Baru
live.description: Student-run concert at Berklee College of Music performing iconic Malaysian hits of the modern century.
roles: Track Producer (set design, playback engineering, track production)
Head of Post Production (show mix & master)

live.title: ambient night
live.description: Improvisatory ambient performance hosted by the Electronic Production & Design Department at Berklee College of Music.

live.title: LIVE @ Purgatory
live.description: Improvisatory live set performed at Purgatory, Brooklyn as an opening set for acloudyskye.

live.title: Live & New England Synthfest
live.description: Hybrid livecoding, modular, and improvisatory electroacoustic performance.

multimedia.title: futurepast
multimedia.description: VR run-through of the installation "futurepast" created for the TeleAbsense project.

multimedia.title: oasis
multimedia.description: Audiovisual installation built with generative audio and visuals inspired by liminal spaces, depicting a virtual ecosystem loosely based on planet Earth.
multimedia.exhibition: Berklee College of Music, Boston, MA

multimedia.title: generon
multimedia.description: Digital instrument developed as part of a larger generative music system, transmitting a continuous stream of MIDI notes influenced by touch sensor input to enhance performability.

multimedia.title: afterglow
multimedia.description: AI-generated audiovisual project based on a dataset of 500+ sky images, with visuals that interactively respond to music using RunwayML.
